comment:
* Utility class containing status codes and functions used by various response objects. * *

Those status codes are internal only. * * @hide

variables.name: STATUS_UNSET
variables.comment:
* The status code has not been set. Keep unset status code the lowest value of the status
     * codes.

variables.name: STATUS_SUCCESS
variables.comment: The call was successful.

variables.name: STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR
variables.comment:
* An internal error occurred within the API, which the caller cannot address. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_INVALID_ARGUMENT
variables.comment:
* The caller supplied invalid arguments to the call. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalArgumentException}.

variables.name: STATUS_UNKNOWN_ERROR
variables.comment: There was an unknown error.

variables.name: STATUS_IO_ERROR
variables.comment:
* There was an I/O error. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IOException}.

variables.name: STATUS_RATE_LIMIT_REACHED
variables.comment:
* Result code for Rate Limit Reached. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link LimitExceededException}.

variables.name: STATUS_KILLSWITCH_ENABLED
variables.comment:
* Killswitch was enabled. AdServices is not available. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_USER_CONSENT_REVOKED
variables.comment:
* User consent was revoked. AdServices is not available. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_ADSERVICES_DISABLED
variables.comment:
* AdServices were disabled. AdServices is not available. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_PERMISSION_NOT_REQUESTED
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call. Permission was not requested. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call. Caller is not allowed (not present in the * allowed list). * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_BACKGROUND_CALLER
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call. Call was executed from background thread. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_UNAUTHORIZED
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_TIMEOUT
STATUS_JS_SANDBOX_UNAVAILABLE
variables.comment:
* The device is not running a version of WebView that supports JSSandbox, required for FLEDGE * Ad Selection. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_INVALID_OBJECT
variables.comment:
* The service received an invalid object from the remote server. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link InvalidObjectException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_CROSS_USER_BOUNDARIES
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call because it crosses user boundaries. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_SERVER_RATE_LIMIT_REACHED
variables.comment:
* Result code for Server Rate Limit Reached. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link LimitExceededException}.

variables.name: STATUS_USER_CONSENT_NOTIFICATION_NOT_DISPLAYED_YET
variables.comment:
* Consent notification has not been displayed yet. AdServices is not available. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_ENCRYPTION_FAILURE
variables.comment:
* Result code for Encryption related failures. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalArgumentException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_PACKAGE_NOT_IN_ALLOWLIST
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call because the package is not in the allowlist. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_PACKAGE_BLOCKLISTED
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call because the package is not in the allowlist. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_ENROLLMENT_MATCH_NOT_FOUND
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call because enrollment data can't be found. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_ENROLLMENT_INVALID_ID
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call because enrollment ID is invalid. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_ENROLLMENT_BLOCKLISTED
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call because enrollment ID is in the blocklist. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_MANIFEST_ADSERVICES_CONFIG_NO_PERMISSION
variables.comment:
* The caller is not authorized to make this call because permission was not requested in the * manifest. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link SecurityException}.

variables.name: STATUS_ADSERVICES_ACTIVITY_DISABLED
variables.comment:
* AdServices activity is disabled. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: STATUS_CALLBACK_SHUTDOWN
variables.comment:
* Callback is shut down and encountered an error when invoking its methods. * *

This error may be considered similar to {@link IllegalStateException}.

variables.name: RATE_LIMIT_REACHED_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment: The error message to be returned along with {@link LimitExceededException}.

variables.name: SERVER_RATE_LIMIT_REACHED_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment: The error message to be returned along with {@link LimitExceededException}.

variables.name: SECURITY_EXCEPTION_PERMISSION_NOT_REQUESTED_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* The error message to be returned along with {@link SecurityException} when permission was not
     * requested in the manifest.

variables.name: SECURITY_EXCEPTION_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* The error message to be returned along with {@link SecurityException} when caller is not
     * allowed to call AdServices (not present in the allowed list).

variables.name: ILLEGAL_STATE_BACKGROUND_CALLER_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* The error message to be returned along with {@link SecurityException} when call was executed
     * from the background thread.

variables.name: ILLEGAL_STATE_ACTIVITY_DISABLED_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* The error message to be returned along with {@link IllegalStateException} when call failed
     * because AdServices activity is disabled.

variables.name: SECURITY_EXCEPTION_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_CROSS_USER_BOUNDARIES
variables.comment:
* The error message to be returned along with {@link SecurityException} when call failed
     * because it crosses user boundaries.

variables.name: SECURITY_EXCEPTION_CALLER_NOT_ALLOWED_ON_BEHALF_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* The error message to be returned along with {@link SecurityException} when caller not allowed
     * to perform this operation on behalf of the given package.

variables.name: TIMED_OUT_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment: The error message to be returned along with {@link TimeoutException}.

variables.name: INVALID_OBJECT_ERROR_MESSAGE
variables.comment: The error message to be returned along with {@link InvalidObjectException}.

variables.name: ENCRYPTION_FAILURE_MESSAGE
variables.comment: The error message to be returned along with {@link IllegalArgumentException}.

methods.name: public static boolean isSuccess(@StatusCode int statusCode)
methods.comment: Returns true for a successful status.

methods.name: public static Exception asException(@StatusCode int statusCode)
methods.comment: Converts the input {@code statusCode} to an exception to be used in the callback.

methods.name: public static Exception asException(@NonNull AdServicesResponse adServicesResponse)
methods.comment: TODO(b/328601595): Add unit test for AdServicesStatusUtils.asException

methodNames: public static boolean isSuccess(@StatusCode int statusCode)
public static Exception asException(@StatusCode int statusCode)
public static Exception asException(@NonNull AdServicesResponse adServicesResponse)
